document_data.mainbody:
angerous Tunes was a history book dedicated to the subject of magical songs and singing spells, printed sometime in or before the late 15 century DR.
Dangerous Tunes collected lore on spells that were performed in the form songs with the goal of ensorcelling or enthralling their listeners. Two of such songs listed in the book were Chionthar Harpys Siren Song and Glimmergads Stupefying Melancholy.
Dangerous Tunes could be found in the city of Baldurs Gate and sold by Thomas C. Quirkilious of Chromatic Scales located in the Lower City of the Gate.
